scripts.local:setup: php artisan migrate:fresh --force && php artisan db:seed && php artisan journal:set-accounts
scripts.docker:install: docker compose exec -T web composer install --ignore-platform-reqs
scripts.docker:update: docker compose exec web composer update --ignore-platform-reqs
scripts.docker:generate: docker compose exec -T web php artisan key:generate
scripts.docker:migrate: docker compose exec web php artisan migrate
scripts.docker:schedule: docker compose exec web php artisan schedule:work
scripts.docker:seed: docker compose exec web php artisan db:seed
scripts.docker:set-accounts: docker compose exec web php artisan journal:set-accounts
scripts.docker:artisan: docker compose exec web php artisan
scripts.docker:dev: npm run docker:up-dev && npm run docker:install && npm run docker:migrate && npm run docker:seed && npm run docker:set-accounts
scripts.docker:setup: npm run docker:up && npm run docker:install && npm run docker:migrate && npm run docker:seed && npm run docker:set-accounts
